EmailTemplate.subject: Customer Success: NCR Freshop + Northgate Markets
EmailTemplate.textOnly: The largest Hispanic supermarket chain in the U.S., Northgate Market, needed to launch curbside pickup during the pandemic, but didn’t have online ordering. They also needed to keep things in-house and had to beat premium delivery service pricing to stay competitive. The solution: With the help of NCR Freshop, they gave customers a new way to shop, via Pronto! Curbside and took advantage of new insights that gave them a deep dive into store and shopper activity. How did their customers react?
